casebody.data:
John R. VIDOLICH, II, Trustee of the John R. Vidolich II Trust, Plaintiff/Counter-Defendant-Appellant,
v.
SALINE NORTHVIEW CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, Defendant/Counter-Plaintiff/ Counter-Defendant/Third Party Plaintiff-Appellee,
and
Jovi Enterprises, LLC, Counter-Plaintiff/Third Party Defendant-Appellant,
and
Dawn E. Bednarski, Plaintiff. SC: 157249
COA: 334579 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 4, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of appellee to extend the time for filing an answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before April 30, 2018.
